Content:: Andrey Sergeyevich Zeits (Russian: Андрей Сергеевич Зейц; born 14 December 1986) is a Kazakh road bicycle racer, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Astana Qazaqstan Team.[5] In 2009, Zeits rode the Giro d'Italia, the first grand tour of his career,[6] which he finished in 31st place. After twelve years with the Astana team, Zeits joined Mitchelton–Scott on a two-year contract from the 2020 season.[2] He rejoined the renamed Astana Qazaqstan Team for the 2022 season.[7] Former riders: list of riders  This biographical article relating to Kazakhstani cycling is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
